title: John Russell, 1st Earl Russell
summary: John Russell, 1st Earl Russell, KG, GCMG, PC, FRS (18 August 1792 â€“ 28 May 1878), known by his courtesy title Lord John Russell before 1861, was a British Whig and Liberal statesman who served as Prime Minister of the United Kingdom from 1846 to 1852 and again from 1865 to 1866.
